The Historical Archives of Pirot () are the primary institution responsible for preservation of archival materials in the Pirot District located in Pirot, Serbia. The archives are primarily serving municipalities of Pirot, Bela Palanka, Babu≈°nica, and Dimitrovgrad. The archives were established in 1956. In 2021, the archives received the annual Golden Archives prize, the national prize for best archival practices.
